faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our AI companions

items.question: How do AI companions work?
items.answer: Our AI companions use advanced natural language processing to engage in meaningful conversations. Each character has a unique personality, background, and interests that make interactions feel natural and engaging.

items.question: Are the conversations private?
items.answer: Yes, all conversations with our AI companions are completely private and secure. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data and ensure your privacy.

items.question: Can I customize my AI companion?
items.answer: While each character has a predefined personality, you can influence the conversation and build a unique relationship with your chosen companion through your interactions.

items.question: How many companions can I chat with?
items.answer: You can chat with as many companions as you'd like! Each character offers a different experience, so feel free to explore and find the ones that resonate with you.

items.question: Is there a limit on conversation length?
items.answer: There are no strict limits on conversation length. You can have deep, meaningful conversations that last as long as you'd like with your AI companion.
